title: Open-source community releases new LLM evaluation toolkit
description: Toolkit standardizes prompts and metrics for fair model comparison.
content: The OSS community announced a new evaluation suite that enables reproducible LLM benchmarking across reasoning and safety tasks...
creator: M. Patel

title: EU proposes framework for AI transparency in news feeds
description: Draft bill outlines disclosure for recommendation algorithms.
content: A new proposal would require platforms to explain ranking signals and allow opt-out from algorithmic personalization, aiming to curb misinformation...
creator: Laura Rossi

title: Breakthrough in battery tech extends EV range
description: Solid-state prototype demonstrates higher energy density.
content: An engineering team reported a solid-state chemistry that reduces dendrite formation and increases cycle life, potentially extending EV ranges by 30%...
creator: Dr. Nguyen

title: Markets react to unexpected rate decision
description: Central bank signals longer tightening cycle.
content: Equities fell as the central bank surprised markets with a hold and hawkish guidance, pushing yields higher across the curve...
creator: S. Rivera
